CustomField.description: wd field Evaluates to "True" if Opportunity is Won - else is blank. Requires that the opportunity name is populated.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( FCR_Opportunity__c )), FCR_Opportunity__r.IsWon = True), "True", null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Evaluates to "True" if Opportunity is Won - else is blank. Requires that the opportunity name is populated.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Closed Won
